column1: The Bulgarian federation together with USTREM the organizer did a
splendid Job with these championships. It was organized in a nearly
perfect manner to big Buses and 2 minibuses did transport for all.
The standard was the same like in earlier great Championships. with
perfect loaders only 3 loading-errors. but very save for the lifters.
So thank of the IPF is going to the Bulgarian Federation. USTREM and
all the helpers during these 6 days.
19th Juniors World Single Championships 11.09.2001 Sofia - Bulgaria
in the Competition were participating 70 Women .
19th Juniors World Single Championships 11.09.2001 Sofia - Bulgaria
